about_us_text: We are an innovative platform dedicated to facilitating access to quality healthcare services. We connect patients with the best medical professionals quickly and securely.
appointments_subtitle: Manage and view your scheduled appointments
billing_signin_prompt: Sign in to manage your billing.
cardiology_text: Specialized care for heart and cardiovascular system problems.
dermatology_text: Skin care and treatment of dermatological diseases.

chatbot_r_greeting:
Hello! Welcome to VirtualAid. I am here to help you with:
‚Ä¢ Information about our specialties
‚Ä¢ How to schedule an appointment

chatbot_r_how:
To schedule an appointment, follow these steps:
1. Click 'Sign Up' in the menu
2. Select the specialty you need
3. Choose an available date and time
4. Confirm your booking

Would you like me to redirect you to registration?

choose_specialty_text: Find the perfect specialist for your specific medical needs.
confirm_booking_text: Your appointment will be scheduled instantly, without complications or delays.
contact_us_text: Do you have any questions? We're here to help you. Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
create_your_account: Create your account and start enjoying our medical services
description: Connect with certified healthcare professionals and receive the medical care you need from the comfort of your home.
enter_code: Enter the code we sent to your email
send_code_desc: We'll send a verification code to your email

empty_upcoming_desc: Schedule your next medical consultation to stay healthy

greeting_subtitle: Welcome to your personal health dashboard

loading_dashboard_desc: Waiting for profile, appointments, payments and billing to be ready to avoid flicker.

card_payment_note: Card integration requires a gateway (Stripe/Adyen) in the backend.

email_reminder_enabled: You will be reminded by email.

start_new_meeting_sub: Start a new meeting with your doctor safely and privately
steps_subtitle: Schedule your medical appointment in 3 simple steps
title: Schedule your medical appointment
traumatology_text: Treatment of injuries to bones, muscles and joints.
why_choose_sub: Discover the advantages that make us unique
why_management_text: View, reschedule or cancel your appointments easily from your user panel.
why_online_text: Schedule appointments anytime and anywhere, with just a few clicks.
why_pricing_text: No surprises. Know the exact cost before confirming your medical appointment.
